Title: Charles-Hubert Paris 3781 Gold-Plated Hunter Case Quartz Pocket Watch
Description: Charles-Hubert, Paris 3781 Gold-Plated Hunter Case Quartz Pocket Watch Features: 14k gold-plated brass 48mm hunter case with a matching curb chainWhite dial with date displaySwiss parts quartz movementDeluxe gift box Product Details: Product Dimensions: 4.9 x 4.4 x 1.5 inchesShipping Weight: 5.6 ouncesItem model number: 3781Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S. International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More Description Etched with a heraldic front case design, this 14k gold plated pocket watch is an essential element for your lifestyle. Engineered with precise Swiss quartz movement, the watch has a white dial with gold-tone indicators. A deluxe gift box and chain are included. White dial. Date display. Swiss parts quartz movement. Comes with deluxe gift box. 14k gold-plated. Brass finish. 1.89 in. Dia. Warm gold-tones add a luxe look and feel to a classic style in the Charles-Hubert, Paris Gold-Plated Quartz Pocket Watch 3781. This understated, elegant pocket watch features 14K gold-plated brass construction from case to chain; detailed floral and filigree design on both sides of its cover; gold- tone Roman numerals on a crisp white dial for easy time-reading; and a convenient date display above six o'clock to help keep your day on-track. Reliable and precise thanks to quartz movement, this Charles-Hubert original comes with a matching curb chain and arrives in a deluxe blue gift-box.
